寒亭.definition: Hanting district of Weifang city 濰坊市|潍坊市[Wei2 fang1 shi4], Shandong

寒亭區.definition: Hanting district of Weifang city 濰坊市|潍坊市[Wei2 fang1 shi4], Shandong

寒傖.definition: variant of 寒磣|寒碜[han2 chen5]

寒光閃閃.definition: (of a bladed weapon etc) to gleam coldly

寒意.definition: a nip in the air; chilliness

寒暄.definition: to exchange conventional greetings; to exchange pleasantries

寒武紀.definition: Cambrian geological period (541-485.4 million years ago)

寒武紀大爆發.pinyin: hán wǔ jì dà bào fā

寒武紀生命大爆發.pinyin: hán wǔ jì shēng mìng dà bào fā

寒毛.definition: fine hair on the human body

寒氣.definition: cold air; a chill one feels in the body (when exposed to cold air)

寒流.definition: cold air current; cold ocean current; cold stream

寒蟬.definition: a cicada in cold weather (used as a metaphor for sb who keeps their thoughts to themself); Meimuna opalifera, a kind of cicada found in East Asia

寒蟬效應.definition: the chilling effect of a climate of fear in which people are afraid to speak their mind

寒酸.definition: wretched; poverty-stricken; unpresentable (for clothing, gifts etc)

寒門.definition: poor and humble family; my family (humble)

寒露.definition: Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October

寒食.definition: cold food (i.e. to abstain from cooked food for 3 days around the Qingming festival 清明節|清明节); the Qingming festival

寒鴉.definition: (bird species of China) western jackdaw; Eurasian jackdaw (Coloeus monedula)
